name: Space Ghost CGA
description:
Space Ghost CGA is a crazy mix of Pacman, Asteroids and Bomberman in space. Are you tough enough to handle this? We think you're not. 

Controls

🙈 Use UP, LEFT, RIGHT arrow keys or W, A, D keys to move.

🙉 Press SPACE, X or O to detonate Pacman. (That's right. Pacman explodes in this game.)

How to Play

  • Destroy all enemies on screen to clear each level.
  • Wait until enemies are in Pacman's range and detonate him. He'll explode and they'll be destroyed.
  • On some levels, instead of detonating Pacman, you'll shoot lasers.
  • Don't get near the Pacman or any of the enemies or they'll drain your ship's shields.
  • Your ship gets destroyed when your shields are completely drained.

Browsers

  • Google Chrome - 70+ (⭐️ highly recommended)
  • Firefox - 63+
